summary: Ke Wang is an undergraduate student at School of Artificial Intelligence, Nanjing University. He is an incoming Ph.D. student in Multi-Media Lab(MMLab) at CUHK, supervised by Prof. Hongsheng Li and Prof. Xiaogang Wang. Currently, he work as a research scientist intern at AIGC Research and Application Group, SenseTime with Researcher Mingjie Zhan. His research interests lie in Large Language Models (LLMs) for Mathematical Reasoning and Large Multimodal Models (LMMs).
title: Ke Wang

summary:
Aug 2024 - Present, Ph.D. Student at MMLab@CUHK, The Chinese University of Hong Kong, Hong Kong, China

title: MathCoder: Seamless Code Integration in LLMs for Enhanced Mathematical Reasoning

title: Solving Challenging Math Word Problems Using GPT-4 Code Interpreter with Code-based Self-Verification
